common_2130_announce_01:
Finally, only four Trainers remain! Time for our
contestants to face their third matches, everyone!
common_2130_announce_02:
The matchup for this battle will be Champion
[trnm:0] versus...
common_2130_battle_02:
This “School Battle Brawl” is for deciding the
strongest Trainer in the academy, right?\c
Man, I’m so pumped up!!![npcn:24]
common_2130_battle_03:
There’s no better place for me to show off
my strengths![npcn:24]
common_2130_battle_04:
And I hear you’re the reason we’re having this
tournament? You have my thanks for that![npcn:24]
common_2130_battle_06:
As a teacher, I feel like it’s my duty to lead my
students to success.[npcn:24]
common_2130_battle_07:
BUT! Since I AM the battle studies teacher here,
I can’t very well lose in a battle, can I?![npcn:24]
common_2130_battle_08:
So don’t expect me to go easy on you! I’m going
to give it all I’ve got![npcn:24]
common_2130_announce_04:
And the winner of this third-round battle is...
Champion [trnm:0]!
common_2130_battle_10:
But I still got something great out of this battle!
This was a massive chance for me to grow![npcn:24]
common_2130_battle_11:
You may be surprised to hear this, but we adults
are still learning every day, too.[npcn:24]
common_2130_battle_12:
That’s why we’re always harping on you kids to
study! Turns out we actually DO know what we’re\r
talking about![npcn:24]
common_2130_battle_13:
Thanks for the battle! Keep aiming for the top in
this tournament, and don’t forget...\r
Osu! Osu! Osu![npcn:24]
